alert.note: Alert for Richland (North Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks (Northeastern North Dakota and Northwestern Minnesota)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued December 09 at 5:55AM CST until December 09 at 3:00PM CST by NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 3 PM CST THIS AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Snow and blowing snow. Additional snow accumulations of 1 inch or less. Winds gusting as high as 45 mph, causing visibilities from 1/2 mile to 1 mile. * WHERE...In Minnesota, Clay and Wilkin Counties. In North Dakota, Richland County. * WHEN...Until 3 PM CST this afternoon. * IMPACTS...Travel will be difficult. Blowing snow will reduce the visibility, mainly in open country within the Red River Valley.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for North Dakota can be found at travel.dot.nd.gov and for Minnesota at 511mn.org, or by calling 5 1 1 in either state.
